data.title: Teaching and Administrative Staff
data.text:
2012-13 General Catalog

Teaching Staff

Faculty titles for 2012–13 were verified as of Aug. 31, 2012, and subsequent changes may not be reflected in the following list. Please note that inclusion in this list is not a guarantee that the faculty member will be teaching throughout the 2012–13 academic years. In addition, some faculty listed here as emeriti may be recalled to teach courses.

The listing for most faculty members includes college membership, year of arrival at UC Santa Cruz, academic title, degrees, and former

affiliations.
